name: macOS Big Sur 11.1, Security Update 2020-001 Catalina, Security Update 2020-007 Mojave
available: macOS Big Sur 11.0.1, macOS Catalina 10.15.7, and macOS Mojave 10.14.6

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with system privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Yu Wang of Didi Research America
Yu Wang of Didi Research America

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to cause unexpected system termination or read kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue existed that led to the disclosure of kernel memory. This was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Yu Wang of Didi Research America

advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab

advisories.available: macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.7, macOS Big Sur 11.0.1

advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved logic.

cves.credit: shrek_wzw

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Wojciech Reguła (@_r3ggi) of SecuRing
